name: Zuora
description: Integrate with Zuora to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Subscriptions
tools.description: List subscriptions in Zuora. Optionally filter by account or status. Returns subscription numbers, statuses, and terms.

tools.name: Create Subscription
tools.description: Create a new subscription in Zuora. Specify an account and rate plan.

tools.name: List Accounts
tools.description: List billing accounts in Zuora. Returns account names, numbers, statuses, and balances.

tools.name: List Invoices
tools.description: List invoices in Zuora. Optionally filter by account. Returns invoice numbers, amounts, statuses, and dates.

tools.name: Query
tools.description: Execute a ZOQL (Zuora Object Query Language) query against Zuora. Returns matching records. Example: "SELECT Id, Name, Status FROM Account WHERE Status = 'Active'".

sandbox.label: Sandbox Mode
sandbox.description: Use Zuora sandbox environment for testing
